name: QA Engineer
description:
We are looking for a skilled Middle QA Engineer with Knowledge of quality assurance terminology, methods, and tools to strengthen the RichBrains team!

Responsibilities:

  • Manual testing of web/mobile applications;

  • Regression testing;

  • Analysis of requirements and preparation of a testing documentation;

  • Creating and maintaining testing documentation;

  • Test environments configuration;

  • Autotests (Execution, maintenance, creation).

Requirements:

  • 1+ years of QA experience;

  • Strong knowledge of software testing types, methodologies, and techniques;

  • Familiarity with certain bug tracking and test management tools;

  • Experience in API testing, Postman;

  • Basic knowledge of JS, MySQL;

  • Basic knowledge of Agile methodologies (Scrum/ Kanban);

  • Experience in automation tests will be an advantage;

  • Working in a team;

  • Analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills;

  • Attention to detail;

  • English knowledge (B1 and higher);

  • Focus on quality;

  • Сommunication skills;

Other:

  • Schengen Visa valid for 6 months (Official permission to work in Poland/Lithuania) obligatory;

We offer:

  • Remote work in Poland/Lithuania;

  • Legal support;

  • A friendly, motivated and highly professional team to work with;

  • Continuous training in new technologies;

  • Full-time work with a flexible working schedule;

  • 5 paid days off in a year;
